class.name: FlagPlotting
class.documentation: WMO standard wind flags; represented by barbs and solid pennants

parameter.name: wind_flag_calm_indicator
parameter.documentation: Plot calm indicator circle, if wind speed is less than 0.5 m/s (ON / OFF)

parameter.name: wind_flag_calm_indicator_size
parameter.documentation: The radius of the circle which indicates calm in centimeter

parameter.name: wind_flag_calm_below
parameter.documentation: Winds less than or equal to this value will be drawn as calm.

parameter.name: wind_flag_colour
parameter.documentation: Colour of wind flag shaft, barbs and pennants

parameter.name: wind_flag_cross_boundary
parameter.documentation: If set to 'ON', wind flags are truncated if they cross the subpage border (ON / OFF)

parameter.name: wind_flag_length
parameter.documentation: Physical length of wind flag shaft

parameter.name: wind_flag_max_speed
parameter.documentation: Highest value of wind speed to be plotted
parameter.migration: New Magics: Parameter wind_flag_max_speed sent to new Magics[Wind].

parameter.name: wind_flag_min_speed
parameter.documentation: Lowest value of wind speed to be plotted

parameter.name: wind_flag_mode
parameter.documentation: Controls the line style of the wind flag shaft.(NORMAL / OFF_LEVEL / OFF_TIME)

parameter.name: wind_flag_style
parameter.documentation: Controls the line style of the wind flag shaft.

parameter.name: wind_flag_origin_marker
parameter.documentation: Symbol for marking the exact location of the current grid point.
